statements: SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_id, patient_id, event_date FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = 1 LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events WHERE drug_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT event_id, patient_id, event_date FROM adverse_events WHERE event_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT event_description, patient_id FROM adverse_events WHERE drug_id = 5;
SELECT event_id, COUNT(*) FROM adverse_events GROUP BY event_id;
SELECT MIN(event_date) AS earliest_date, MAX(event_date) AS latest_date FROM adverse_events;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY patient_id, event_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT event_date, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, approval_date FROM drug_safety_info WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT event_id, event_description, patient_id, drug_id FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, adverse_reactions FROM drug_safety_info WHERE drug_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date <= '2021-12-31' AND patient_id = 100
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM adverse_events WHERE patient_id = 200 ORDER BY event_date DESC
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, approval_date FROM drug_safety_info WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'Pfizer%'
SELECT event_id, event_date, event_description FROM adverse_events WHERE drug_id IN (SELECT drug_id FROM drug_safety_info WHERE approval_date >= '2020-01-01')
SELECT DISTINCT patient_id FROM adverse_events WHERE drug_id = 5
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT event_description, event_date FROM AdverseEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, event_description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, approval_date FROM DrugSafetyInformation;
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM RegulatoryCompliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_id, event_description FROM AdverseEvents WHERE patient_id=101;
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer FROM DrugSafetyInformation WHERE approval_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT regulation_name FROM RegulatoryCompliance WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents ae JOIN DrugSafetyInformation dsi ON ae.patient_id = dsi.drug_id;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents;
SELECT event_date, patient_id FROM AdverseEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, safety_rating FROM DrugSafetyInformation WHERE safety_rating > 3;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM PatientSafety WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryCompliance WHERE regulation = 'HIPAA' AND compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM AdverseEvents ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM PatientSafety WHERE patient_id = 3
SELECT drug_name, manufacturer, safety_rating FROM DrugSafetyInformation ORDER BY safety_rating DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM PatientSafety WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM RegulatoryCompliance WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM adverse_events;
SELECT drug_name, patient_id FROM adverse_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patient_info WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM drug_inventory WHERE expiration_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT compliance_id, complaint_date, action_taken FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM adverse_events ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patient_info WHERE age > 50;
SELECT drug_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM drug_inventory WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT patient_name, gender, age, drug_name FROM patient_info JOIN adverse_events ON patient_info.patient_id = adverse_events.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM adverse_events JOIN drug_inventory ON adverse_events.drug_name = drug_inventory.drug_name ORDER BY event_date ASC;
